RACE.RACE_TEXT: FORT ERIE RACE 1 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 76. Allowance Purse 24600. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 122 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Other Than Claiming At A Mile Or Over Since July 1 Allowed 2 lbs. (Colts And Geldings Preferred)(*Plus Up To $4,725 Ontario Bre d/Ontario Sired Breeders Awards).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: NIKOLAOU tracked the early leaders from the inside, was a factor on the far turn and from the four path through the stretch proved best. GRAND GIZMO set the pace and had a clear lead on the far turn but from the three path at the top of the stretch failed to hold. RAGING BEAR was unhurried early, had a mild gain on the far turn and from the six path at the top of the stretch finished well. VITAL SIGNS stalked the early leader and was roused on the far turn but faded through the stretch. STREET MAX was in range but lost ground on the far turn and was empty.

ENTRY.NAME: Nikolaou
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked inside, factor far turn, 4-path stretch, proved best

ENTRY.NAME: Raging Bear
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried, mild gain far turn, 6-path stretch, finished well

ENTRY.NAME: Vital Signs
ENTRY.OWNER: Ascot Stud Blake Sr Michael S Stout Mark and Stocker-Parks Rachel
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked leader, roused far turn, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Street Max
ENTRY.COMMENT: in range, lost ground far turn, empty

ENTRY.NAME: Grand Gizmo
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, clear lead far turn, 3-path stretch, failed to hold

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FORT ERIE RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 60. Claiming Purse 19800. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 122 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 1 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $6,250, if for $6,000, allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $5 ,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (*Plus Up To $540 Ontario Bred/Ontario Sired Breeders Awards).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: NATASHA'S BIZNIZ was in range, saved ground on the turn and from the five path at the top of the stretch drew clear. VERI UNIFIED stalked the early leader, forced the pace on the turn and had the lead from the three path in mid stretch but was caught late. ONLY BELIEVE was off the pace, had a mild gain on the turn and from the six path at the top of the stretch was up for show. SHES ASTYLISH KATZ set the pace and had a slim lead on the turn but had nothing left. HONEYBUNNYBOOBOO broke poorly and showed little while outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Only Believe
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, mild gain turn, 6-path stretch, up for show

ENTRY.NAME: Natasha's Bizniz
ENTRY.COMMENT: in range, saved ground turn, 5-path stretch, drew clear

ENTRY.NAME: Honeybunnybooboo
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke poorly, showed little, outrun

ENTRY.NAME: Veri Unified
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked leader, forced pace turn, led 3-path stretch, caught late

ENTRY.NAME: Shes Astylish Katz
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, slim lead turn, nothing left

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FORT ERIE RACE 3 1 1/16M Dirt CR: 68. Claiming Purse 22200. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE IN 2023 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 122 lbs. Claiming Price $8,000, if for $7,000, allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $6,250 Or Less Not Considered In Eligibility) (*Plus Up To $540 Ontario Bred/Ontario Sired Breeders Awards).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MORE SAVVY set the pace, took command on the far turn and from the three path through the stretch drew off. DOODLE DANDY was well back and closed the gap on the far turn but from the four path at the top of the stretch was no match for the winner. SAN NICOLA STAR was unhurried early and roused on the far turn but from the five path at the top of the stretch was no real threat. KOZY KAT stalked the early leader and was hustled along on the far turn but from the four path at the top of the stretch was not a factor. ROYAL CITY REIGN tracked the leaders from the inside but chased on the far turn and from the three path at the top of the stretch was empty.

ENTRY.NAME: Royal City Reign
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked inside, chased far turn, 3-path stretch, empty

ENTRY.NAME: Kozy Kat
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked, hustled along far turn, 4-path stretch, not a factor

ENTRY.NAME: More Savvy
ENTRY.OWNER: Radcliffe Racing Stable and Admiral Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, took command far turn, 3-path stretch, drew off

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: James Everatt, Janeane Everatt & Arika Everatt-Meeuse

ENTRY.NAME: San Nicola Star
ENTRY.OWNER: Ascot Stud Blake Sr Michael S Files Norman R Brinda Shawn and Suthons Maggie Deb
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, roused far turn, 5-path stretch, no real threat

ENTRY.NAME: Doodle Dandy
ENTRY.OWNER: Hoad Lindsey L and Hoad Joseph B
ENTRY.COMMENT: well back, closed gap far turn, 4-path stretch, no match

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FORT ERIE RACE 4 7F Turf CR: 67. Claiming Purse 19800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 122 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 30 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $6,250, if for $6,000, allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $5,000 Or Less Not C onsidered In Allowances) (Colts And Geldings Preferred)(Limited To 10 Starters)(*Plus Up To $540 Ontario Bred/Ontario Sired Breeders Awards). If deemed inadvisable by management to run on the turf, this race will be run at a distance of Six and One Half F urlongs on the main track.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SENSIBLE PORTIONS showed speed from the outside and set the pace, had a clear lead on the far turn and was kept to task. SYNCHROMESH was unhurried early, gained ground on the far turn and was up for place. DRAGON'S KEY tracked the early leader and was a factor on the far turn but from the the three path at the top of the stretch leveled off. ROCKLAND EXPRESS was in range and hustled along on the far turn but from the four path at the top of the stretch finished evenly. UNBRIDLED INFERNO was in mid pack and raced evenly on the far turn but from the five path at the top of the stretch needed more. IRIE ISLAND MAN was off slow and saved ground on the far turn but was no real threat. ARTIE'S ALL IN was in touch and roused on the far turn but from the three path at the top of the stretch had no response. DYNAMIC MISSION was off the pace, showed nothing and was never in contention.

ENTRY.NAME: Dynamic Mission
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, showed nothing, never in contention

ENTRY.NAME: Synchromesh
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, gained ground far turn, up for place

ENTRY.NAME: Dragon's Key
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked leader, factor far turn, 3-path stretch, leveled off

ENTRY.NAME: Irie Island Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slow, saved ground far turn, no real threat

ENTRY.NAME: Rockland Express
ENTRY.COMMENT: in range, hustled along far turn, 4-path stretch, finished evenly

ENTRY.NAME: Unbridled Inferno
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, evenly far turn, 5-path stretch, needed more

ENTRY.NAME: Artie's All In
ENTRY.COMMENT: in touch, roused far turn, 3-path stretch, no response

ENTRY.NAME: Sensible Portions
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed outside, clear lead far turn, kept to task

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FORT ERIE RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 91. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 21300. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $5,000 OR LESS SINCE AUGUST 1, 2021 OR CLAIMING PRICE $10,000. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 122 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 1 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000, i f for $9,000, allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $8,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (Colts And Geldings Preferred)(*Plus Up To $540 Ontario Bred/Ontario Sired Breeders Awards).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CRAFTY CONQUEST was in range, a factor on the turn and from the three path at the top of the stretch proved best. STRONG ENDING was off the pace, had a mild gain on the turn and from the five path at the top of the stretch was second best. CORE was in touch, hustled along on the turn and from the four path at the top of the stretch was up for show. SUMMER RETREAT set the pace and had the lead on the turn but was headed at the top of the stretch and gave way. MONEY MATTERS stalked the early leader and had a good position on the turn but weakened through the stretch. BIG TIME LOUIE was off slow, showed nothing, was outdistanced and walked off.

ENTRY.NAME: Money Matters
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked leader, good position urn, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Core
ENTRY.OWNER: Warner, Nancy E. and Robert K.
ENTRY.COMMENT: in touch, hustled along turn, 4-path stretch, up for show

ENTRY.NAME: Crafty Conquest
ENTRY.COMMENT: in range, factor turn, 3-path stretch, proved best

ENTRY.NAME: Strong Ending
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, mild gain turn, 5-path stretch, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Big Time Louie
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slow, showed nothing, outdistanced, walked off

ENTRY.NAME: Summer Retreat
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, lead turn, headed top stretch, gave way

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FORT ERIE RACE 6 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 82. Allowance Purse 24600. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 122 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Other Than Claiming Since July 1 Allowed 2 lbs. (Colts And Geldings Preferred)(*Plus Up To $4,725 Ontario Bred/Ontario Sired Breeders Awards).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: JIBARO was away alertly, set the pace, had a clear lead on the turn and just lasted. BIG WARDEN was hustled early, a factor on the turn and from the four path at the top of the stretch just missed. WILBERFORCE showed no speed, trailed the field on the turn and from the six path at the top of the stretch finished well. CANT GLIDE BY KATZ was off the pace and had a mild gain on the turn but from the four path at the top of the stretch needed more. MY GIRL GABBY was unhurried early and saved ground on the turn but was no threat. WOOD BE WILD was up close but chased on the turn and from the five path at the top of the stretch had no kick.

ENTRY.OWNER: Warner, Nancy E. and Robert K.
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, saved ground turn, no threat

ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed, trailed turn, 6-path stretch, finished well

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FORT ERIE RACE 7 7F Turf CR: 70. Claiming Purse 22200. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 122 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 1 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000, if for $9,000, allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $8,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances)(Limited to 10 starters) (*Plus Up To $810 Ontario Bred/Ontario Sired Breeders Awards). If deemed inadvisable by management to run on the turf, this race will be run at a distance of Six and One Half Furlongs o n the main track.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: AWILDAS TREASURE stalked the early leader, was a factor on the far turn and from the three path at the top of the stretch was kept to task. SILENT BUT VIOLENT was in touch, roused on the far turn and from the four path at the top of the stretch was clearly second best. NADIABIZNIZ was in range and raced evenly on the far turn but from the three path at the top of the stretch had no late kick. BLACK TAFFY set the pace and had the lead on the far turn but was headed in mid stretch and gave way. SECRET ARCHANGEL was off the pace and had a mild gain on the far turn but from the five path at the top of the stretch leveled off. NICOLE'S SONG was unhurried early and saved ground on the far turn but failed to fire. HONEY GIRL was up close but lost ground on the far turn and from the four path at the top of the stretch was empty.

ENTRY.NAME: Awildas Treasure
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked leader, factor far turn, 3-path stretch, kept to task
